verses.verse: The word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came again unto me<WH559>, saying,

Son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, say<WH559> unto the prince<WH5057> of Tyrus<WH6865>, Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>; Because your heart<WH3820> is lifted up<WH1361>, and you have said<WH559>, I am a God<WH410>, I sit<WH3427> in the seat<WH4186> of God<WH430>, in the midst<WH3820> of the seas<WH3220>; yet you are a man<WH120>, and not God<WH410>, though you set<WH5414> your heart<WH3820> as the heart<WH3820> of God<WH430>:
Behold<WH2450>, you are wiser than Daniel<WH1840>; there is no secret<WH5640> that they can hide from you<WH6004>:
With your wisdom<WH2451> and with your understanding<WH8394> you have gotten<WH6213> you riches<WH2428>, and have gotten<WH6213> gold<WH2091> and silver<WH3701> into your treasures<WH214>:
By your great<WH7230> wisdom<WH2451> and by your traffic<WH7404> have you increased<WH7235> your riches<WH2428>, and your heart<WH3824> is lifted up<WH1361> because of your riches<WH2428>:
Therefore thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>; Because you have set<WH5414> your heart<WH3820> as the heart<WH3824> of God<WH430>;

Behold<WH935>, therefore I will bring strangers<WH2114> upon you<WH6184>, the terrible of the nations<WH1471>: and they shall draw<WH7324> their swords<WH2719> against the beauty<WH3308> of your wisdom<WH2451>, and they shall defile<WH2490> your brightness<WH3314>.
They shall bring you down<WH3381> to the pit<WH7845>, and you shall die<WH4191> the deaths<WH4463> of them that are slain<WH2491> in the midst<WH3820> of the seas<WH3220>.
Will you yet<WH559> say<WH559> before<WH6440> him that slays<WH2026> you<WH430>, I am God? but you shall be a man<WH120>, and no God<WH410>, in the hand<WH3027> of him that slays you<WH2490>.
You shall die<WH4191> the deaths<WH4194> of the uncircumcised<WH6189> by the hand<WH3027> of strangers<WH2114>: for I have spoken<WH1696> it<WH5002>, says the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>.
Moreover the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came unto me<WH559>, saying,

Son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, take up<WH5375> a lamentation<WH7015> upon the king<WH4428> of Tyrus<WH6865>, and say<WH559> unto him<WH559>, Thus says the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>; You seal up<WH2856> the sum<WH8508>, full<WH4392> of wisdom<WH2451>, and perfect<WH3632> in beauty<WH3308>.

You have been in Eden<WH5731> the garden<WH1588> of God<WH430>; every precious<WH3368> stone<WH68> was your covering<WH4540>, the sardius<WH124>, topaz<WH6357>, and the diamond<WH3095>, the beryl<WH8658>, the onyx<WH7718>, and the jasper<WH3471>, the sapphire<WH5601>, the emerald<WH5306>, and the carbuncle<WH1304>, and gold<WH2091>: the workmanship<WH4399> of your tabrets<WH8596> and of your pipes<WH5345> was prepared<WH3559> in you in the day<WH3117> that you were created<WH1254>.

You are the anointed<WH4473> cherub<WH3742> that covers<WH5526>; and I have set<WH5414> you so<WH6944>: you were upon the holy mountain<WH2022> of God<WH430>; you have walked up and down<WH1980> in the midst<WH8432> of the stones<WH68> of fire<WH784>.
You were perfect<WH8549> in your ways<WH1870> from the day<WH3117> that you were created<WH1254>, until iniquity<WH5766> was found in you<WH4672>.

By the multitude<WH7230> of your merchandise<WH7404> they have filled<WH4390> the midst<WH8432> of you with violence<WH2555>, and you have sinned<WH2398>: therefore I will cast you as profane<WH2490> out of the mountain<WH2022> of God<WH430>: and I will destroy<WH6> you<WH5526>, O covering cherub<WH3742>, from the midst<WH8432> of the stones<WH68> of fire<WH784>.

Your heart<WH3820> was lifted up<WH1361> because of your beauty<WH3308>, you have corrupted<WH7843> your wisdom<WH2451> by reason of<WH5921> your brightness<WH3314>: I will cast<WH7993> you to the ground<WH776>, I will lay<WH5414> you before<WH6440> kings<WH4428>, that they may behold you<WH7200>.

You have defiled<WH2490> your sanctuaries<WH4720> by the multitude<WH7230> of your iniquities<WH5771>, by the iniquity<WH5766> of your traffic<WH7404>; therefore will I bring forth<WH3318> a fire<WH784> from the midst<WH8432> of you<WH398>, it shall devour you<WH5414>, and I will bring you to ashes<WH665> upon the earth<WH776> in the sight<WH5869> of all them that behold you<WH7200>.
All they that know<WH3045> you among the people<WH5971> shall be astonished<WH8074> at you<WH1091>: you shall be a terror, and never<WH369> shall you be any more<WH5704>.
Again the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came unto me<WH559>, saying,
Son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, set<WH7760> your face<WH6440> against Zidon<WH6721>, and prophesy against it<WH5012>,

And say<WH559>, Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>; Behold<WH6721>, I am against you, O Zidon; and I will be glorified<WH3513> in the midst<WH8432> of you<WH3045>: and they shall know that I am the Lord<WH3068>, when I shall have executed<WH6213> judgments<WH8201> in her<WH6942>, and shall be sanctified in her.

For I will send<WH7971> into her pestilence<WH1698>, and blood<WH1818> into her streets<WH2351>; and the wounded<WH2491> shall be judged<WH5307> in the midst<WH8432> of her by the sword<WH2719> upon her on every side<WH5439>; and they shall know<WH3045> that I am the Lord<WH3068>.

And there shall be no more a pricking<WH3992> brier<WH5544> unto the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>, nor any grieving<WH3510> thorn<WH6975> of all that are round about<WH5439> them<WH7590>, that despised them<WH3045>; and they shall know that I am the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>.

Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>; When I shall have gathered<WH6908> the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> from the people<WH5971> among whom they are scattered<WH6327>, and shall be sanctified<WH6942> in them in the sight<WH5869> of the heathen<WH1471>, then shall they live<WH3427> in their land<WH127> that I have given<WH5414> to my servant<WH5650> Jacob<WH3290>.

And they shall live<WH3427> safely<WH983> in it<WH1129>, and shall build houses<WH1004>, and plant<WH5193> vineyards<WH3754>; Yes<WH3427>, they shall live with confidence<WH983>, when I have executed<WH6213> judgments<WH8201> upon all those that despise<WH7590> them round about<WH5439> them<WH3045>; and they shall know that I am the Lord<WH3068> their God<WH430>.
